column1: action_title_election_combined_group_description0:"У вашій державі проходять вибори.\n\n#help Якщо ви [elector|El]
column3: навіть якщо свій голос ви вже віддали. Пам'ятайте: змінити думку можна у будь-який час!\n\nІ навіть якщо ви не [elector|El]
column4: стежити за ходом виборів все ж варто. Врешті-решт
column5: можливо все... а раптом #emp ви#! станете головним кандидатом!#!"

column1: action_grant_vassal_to_rightful_liege_combined_group_name0:"Vassals can be granted to their Rightful Liege"

action_grant_vassal_to_rightful_liege_desc0:"By transfering [secondary_actor.GetNameNoTooltip] to [recipient.GetNameNoTooltip] you will get rid of the [rightful_liege|E] penalty.$action_grant_vassal_to_rightful_liege_HELP$"

action_grant_vassal_to_rightful_liege_HELP0:"\n\n#help [vassals|E] who you are not the Rightful Liege of give you fewer resources and have a reduced [opinion|E] of you. Sometimes it's best to grant these Vassals to their Rightful Liege
column2: presuming that they are also your Vassal.\n\nSometimes granting a Vassal to their Rightful Liege means that you earn less
column3: but it's usually worth to grant them anyway – their Rightful Liege will have a steep Opinion penalty towards you for holding a Vassal they think is theirs.\n\nKeeping a good vassal structure is the key to a stable realm.#!"

column1: action_can_create_head_of_faith_title_desc0:"$action_can_create_head_of_faith_title_spiritual_desc$\n\n#help By creating the head of faith title you also become the [temporal_head_of_faith|E]!#!"
action_can_claim_liege_title0:"You can Claim your Lieges Title"

action_can_claim_liege_title_desc0:"You control a majority of the [counties|E] that are [de_jure|E] to one of your [lieges|E] [titles|E]. This means that you can spend [prestige|E] to get an [unpressed_claim|E] on it!\n\n#help Having an Unpressed Claim on a higher-tier Title gives you an opportunity to increase your rank. You can use it to start a [claimant_faction|E] or simply declare [war|E] directly upon your Liege for it.#!"
action_can_claim_liege_title_label0:"You can Claim your Lieges Title"

action_can_reforge_artifact_desc0:"Your [artifact|E] [artifact.GetName] has low [durability|E]. Artifacts that lose all of their Durability break and can no longer be used.\n\n#help [reforge|E] or [repair|E] low Durability Artifacts with the help of an [GetCourtPositionType('antiquarian_court_position').GetName()] to prevent it from being destroyed!#!"
action_can_reforge_artifact_click0:"#I Click to open the Inventory view#!"

action_can_reforge_artifact_combined_group_description0:"Several of your [artifacts|E] has low [durability|E]. Artifacts that lose all of their Durability break and can no longer be used.\n\n#help [reforge|E] or [repair|E] low Durability Artifacts with the help of an [GetCourtPositionType('antiquarian_court_position').GetName()] to prevent them from being destroyed!#!"
